features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Discover why we are your best option to travel

feature1.title: Travel
feature1.description: A trip with our service is much more than a simple journey, it is an experience full of comfort and personalized attention. Each destination becomes a journey of relaxation and unique discovery.

feature2.title: Experience
feature2.description: Discover a world where every trip transforms into a connection opportunity. You will live unforgettable moments, enjoying impeccable service, extraordinary destinations, and attention that takes care of every detail.

feature3.title: Relax
feature3.description: Every trip is a getaway created to renew body and soul. Enjoy exclusive destinations, high-end services, and special attention designed to make you experience the total relaxation you deserve.

services.intro: Eugenia Travel Consultancy Taxi is the leading taxi booking website that has been helping tourists and residents to find reliable airport transport services. We have been working in the market for many years, we understand the needs & demands of customers and also the expectations of taxi drivers.

privateTransfer.title: Private Transfer Specialists
privateTransfer.description: Eugenia Travel Consultancy is the airport transfer service providers who have managed the highly interactive and simple to use taxi booking website.

simpleBooking.title: Simple Booking System
simpleBooking.description: Eugenia Travel Consultancy booking website has the simplest cab booking services. Here is the 3-step process that you have to follow to book your next cab.

customerSatisfaction.title: 100% Customer Satisfaction
customerSatisfaction.description: Our customer is our biggest asset. We will assure that you will be satisfied with the services that you acquire.

waitingTime.title: Waiting Time
waitingTime.description: Our customer is our biggest asset. We will assure that you will be satisfied with the services that you acquire.

meetGreet.title: Meet And Greet Service
meetGreet.description: All pickups from airport comes with Meet and Greet service, it will allow you to easily get out of the airport and be in the cab.

specialServices.title: Special Services
specialServices.description: All our services are available at a most affordable rate to assure that you will not have to worry about your budget.

company.title: Our Company
company.description: Welcome to Eugenia's Travel Consultancy, your definitive solution for reliable, elegant and personalized transfers. With roots in Sicily, Italy, we bring warm Sicilian hospitality and Mediterranean charm to every journey. We specialize in providing exceptional transportation experiences that combine comfort, efficiency and attention to detail.

punctuality.title: Punctuality
punctuality.description: Punctuality reflects commitment and efficiency, ensuring that services are respected with precision at the established time.

professionalDrivers.title: Professional Drivers
professionalDrivers.description: Our professional drivers stand out for their experience and dedication, offering a safe and high-quality service.

security.title: Security
security.description: Security in travel and integral logistics reflects our commitment to the tranquility and well-being of our clients.

reliableCompany.title: Reliable Company
reliableCompany.description: We are a reliable company that combines experience and professionalism to offer quality service and guarantee the satisfaction of our clients.

about.title: We are here to make your journey simple and exciting for you
about.paragraph1: Reliable, executive, and safe transportation services are a rare commodity nowadays. The good news is that Eugenia Travel Consultancy taxi is just a call away.
about.paragraph2: Ever been in a position where you were running late and had to catch a plane at the last minute? Well, Eugenia Travel Consultancy is available for you, with a reliable taxi company number for you to dial and get your needs sorted. With us, you are assured of timely arrival. The last-minute savior indeed!

destinations.subtitle: Book your taxi now and travel comfortably

contacts.title: Do you have any questions?
contacts.subtitle: We are here to help you

footer.description2: Available 24/7 to take you wherever you need.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: The contract stipulated online with Eugenia's Travel, Eugenias Travel Consultancy, La Sicilia Tour, My Taxi Airport, Mytransfertrip, Mybooking is governed by the following conditions:
terms.section1_1: The online transfer booking service is managed by Eugenia's Travel, Eugenia's Travel Consultancy, La Sicilia Tour, My Taxi Airport, Mytransfertrip, Mybooking (hereinafter Eugenia's Travel Consultancy) which operates the transportation of persons in full compliance with current national and European laws. In particular, Eugenia's Travel Consultancy is responsible for managing all connections throughout Italy and El Salvador.
terms.section1_2: Booking services offered by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy implies automatic acceptance of all the conditions specified below. Any clarifications must be requested from Eugenia's Travel Consultancy's assistance service before booking.
terms.section1_3: The services managed by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy are as follows:
terms.section1_3a: A – PRIVATE SERVICE (exclusive transfer): It is a transport service reserved exclusively for the person who purchased it for himself or for the group to which he belongs. Eugenia's Travel Consultancy staff waits for the customer at the booked time, transports them directly to the requested destination, assists them in loading and unloading luggage.
terms.section1_3b: B – OFFERS: It is a transport service reserved exclusively for the person who purchased it for himself or for the group to which he belongs. These are low-cost services provided exclusively on certain days at times pre-established by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy. The vehicle is adapted to the needs specified during the booking phase and equipped with all requested optional services.
terms.section2_1: Bookings are made online and must contain express acceptance of all these contractual conditions. In case of booking made on behalf of "third parties", the person making the booking accepts the contractual conditions also on behalf of the same "third parties" with whom he remains jointly liable.
terms.section2_2: The customer making the booking, for himself and/or for others, assumes full responsibility with regard to: completeness and correctness of the data indicated in the booking; being of legal age; ownership and validity of the credit card used for the transaction and availability of necessary funds; errors made during booking in indicating dates and times, flight numbers, pickup and drop-off points, type of service chosen.
terms.section2_2b: If errors made during booking result in failure and/or unsatisfactory provision of the service, Eugenia's Travel Consultancy will not be required to make any refunds.
terms.section2_2c: If the customer requests to modify the trip in whole or in part compared to what was booked and this occurs before departure or during the trip itself, he will be required – provided that the variation is possible and authorized by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy, to pay the driver directly the entire additional amount due to increased travel time or kilometers traveled.
terms.section2_2d: The customer must indicate in the booking request his mobile number complete with prefix (if he does not have a mobile phone, he must indicate the phone number of the facility where he is staying: hotel, residence, etc.) so as to allow Eugenia's Travel Consultancy to communicate any changes in service delivery due, for example, to adverse weather conditions, heavy traffic, or any other event that prevents the exact performance of the service. Each modification will be communicated to the customer by sending an SMS.
terms.section2_3: Upon receiving the booking request, Eugenia's Travel Consultancy verifies its availability to provide the service and if positive sends the customer, by email, booking confirmation which constitutes the only travel document, which must be presented to the driver in charge of the service and will entitle use of transportation. At the same time, the service amount is charged to the customer's credit card.
terms.section2_3b: If there are no available funds and the transaction is denied, the booking will be automatically cancelled. If Eugenia's Travel Consultancy is not in a position to accept the service as requested, it communicates to the customer by email the non-acceptance of the request; in this case nothing will be charged to the customer. Eugenia's Travel Consultancy also reserves the right to propose, always by email, any alternative or modificative solutions.
terms.section2_4: Upon receiving the travel document, the customer checks the contents and reports any discrepancies by email to info@eugeniastravelconsultancy.com within 48 hours.
terms.section2_5: If, due to delays and/or time changes or in any case for reasons not attributable to Eugenia's Travel Consultancy, the customer does not use the booked transport service, he will not be entitled to any kind of refund.
terms.section2_6: In any case, the customer will be granted the rights set forth in the Consumer Code (Legislative Decree No. 206/2005).
terms.section3_1: The customer has the right to withdraw without any penalty and without specifying the reasons within 10 (ten) working days from the day of conclusion of the contract and from the date of service (arts.64 and 65 C.d.C.), by sending a written communication to Eugenia's Travel Consultancy headquarters, Via Torretta 173 Acireale (95024) Catania (CT) ITALY by registered letter with return receipt or by email (to info@eugeniastravelconsultancy.com) provided it is confirmed, by email, within the following 48 hours. In this event, the parties will be released from all obligations except for services already performed in whole or in part, the cost of which will be withheld from the amount paid at the time of booking.
terms.section4_1: The applicable law is only Italian law, regardless of the customer's nationality. Any dispute that arises between the Customer and Eugenia's Travel Consultancy must be submitted exclusively to the Italian Judicial Authority. For any dispute, the Court of Syracuse will have exclusive jurisdiction.
terms.section5_1: Each passenger is allowed to bring one suitcase and one hand luggage. Passengers can also bring, after notification at the time of booking, equipment for transporting children or disabled persons, etc. Everything that exceeds normal luggage must be declared in the booking in the "notes" section and entails, where provided, the application of an additional fee. If additional luggage is not declared, Eugenia's Travel Consultancy may refuse to transport it.
terms.section5_1b: Eugenia's Travel Consultancy reserves the right to apply a possible surcharge for luggage that exceeds what is allowed when this involves using a larger vehicle or an additional vehicle compared to that normally used for the number of passengers booked.
terms.section5_2: All luggage must clearly display the owner's name and destination. It is transported under the customer's sole responsibility; any loss or damage will not entitle to any refund. Luggage or personal effects left in the vehicle by the Customer who used the transport service may be delivered, upon Customer's request, to the address he communicates and at his expense.
terms.section6_1: Eugenia's Travel Consultancy has no responsibility to verify any flight or train delays related to the Customer's booking. Delays must be promptly communicated by the Customer experiencing them to Eugenia's Travel Consultancy's assistance service.
terms.section6_2: For a private transfer booking or an offer, if a flight or train delay not reported by the Customer occurs, the Eugenia's Travel Consultancy operator will wait up to a maximum of 60 minutes from the scheduled arrival time. Beyond this wait, the Customer who confirms the need for transport service despite the delay will be required to pay a supplementary fee of €40.00 for each hour or fraction of an hour following the first 60 minutes of delay. This amount must be paid directly to the Eugenia's Travel Consultancy driver before departure. The wait, in any case, cannot extend beyond two hours from the scheduled pickup time.
terms.section6_2b: If the Customer does not communicate the delay to Eugenia's Travel Consultancy or does not accept payment of the supplementary fee, he will have no right to use the service, nor can he claim any refund.
terms.section6_3: Eugenia's Travel Consultancy is not responsible for any consequences suffered by the Customer, including loss of flight or rail connection, following events that occurred independently of its will such as: bad weather, heavy traffic, road interruptions, unscheduled road closures not reported by competent authorities, accidents, checks by relevant authorities, road blocks for demonstrations and any and all unforeseen or unforeseeable events.
terms.section6_3b: However, it is possible for the Customer to obtain, with the production of a reasoned and documented request, a refund of the transfer price paid in advance, only if the failure to use the requested service or its interruption before the end fall within the cases provided for in Article 8 below.
terms.section7_1: Smoking is prohibited on board vehicles used by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy.
terms.section7_2: It is not permitted to transport alcoholic beverages or narcotic substances on board vehicles used for services offered by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy.
terms.section7_3: Eugenia's Travel Consultancy operators may refuse to transport anyone deemed to be under the influence of alcohol or drugs and/or whose behavior is considered dangerous for the safety of the driver, passengers and vehicle to be used.
terms.section7_4: All vehicles used by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy are regularly insured for civil liability towards third parties, including passengers, in compliance with current national and European regulations.
terms.section7_5: Transfers carried out by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy are door-to-door transfers. Where it is not possible to reach the destination because it is unreachable with the vehicle, due to transit prohibitions, limitations, etc., it will be the Customer's responsibility to report such occurrences to Eugenia's Travel Consultancy and Eugenia's Travel Consultancy will be relieved of all responsibility.
terms.section8_1: Booking can be cancelled only and exclusively by email to info@eugeniastravelconsultancy.com and will be confirmed, always by email, by Eugenia's Travel Consultancy. If the customer does not receive the booking cancellation confirmation email, he must contact Eugenia's Travel Consultancy assistance.
terms.section8_1b: Booking cancellation must be made at least ten days before the date booked for the outbound trip; in this case no penalty will be applied and Eugenia's Travel Consultancy will refund only the cost of the booked transfer and any supplements minus the bank transaction cost. If cancellation is not made within ten days before the transfer date, the Customer will not be entitled to any refund.
terms.section8_1c: Eugenia's Travel Consultancy reserves the right to proceed with booking cancellation at any time, if unable to ensure proper service provision, informing the Customer and refunding the cost of the booked service.
terms.section8_2: Booking modifications must be communicated by email to info@eugeniastravelconsultancy.com at least 48 (forty-eight) hours before the booked service and Eugenia's Travel Consultancy reserves the right to accept the requested modification. If the Customer does not receive modification confirmation by email, he must contact Eugenia's Travel Consultancy assistance.
terms.section8_3: Any complaints and/or refund requests must be addressed to Eugenia's Travel Consultancy in writing by email to info@eugeniastravelconsultancy.com, within 30 (thirty) days from service provision.
terms.section9_1: On the website www.eugeniastravelconsultancy.com, www.eugeniastravel.com, www.lasiciliatour.com, www.mybookingtaxi.com, www.mytaxiairport.com, bookings can be made in various languages. If translation discrepancies occur, the Italian language version will prevail.
terms.section10_1: Pursuant to art.13 of Legislative Decree no.196/2003 and in relation to personal data that Eugenia's Travel Consultancy will come into possession of at the time of booking, the following is specified:
terms.section10_2: Data processing is aimed exclusively at the correct and complete execution of the requested service and is carried out by means of the operations indicated in art.4 paragraph 1 lett.a of the aforementioned legislative decree. Operations will be carried out with the aid of electronic tools. Processing is performed by the data controller and/or by data processors. Personal data is not subject to disclosure, nor will it be transferred abroad.
terms.section10_3: The customer may at any time obtain from the data controller confirmation of the existence of his personal data, their update as well as rectification and/or integration and/or cancellation and/or transformation into anonymous form.
terms.specificApproval: All contractual conditions published on the website www.eugeniastravelconsultancy.com, www.eugeniastravel.com, www.lasiciliatour.com, www.mybookingtaxi.com, www.mytaxiairport.com are accepted. In particular, after careful reading, the following conditions are specifically approved, pursuant to and for the purposes of arts.1341 and 1342 of the Civil Code in force in Italy:
terms.clause1: 1.2 and 2.1: booking and automatic acceptance of all contractual clauses
terms.clause2: 4: law – jurisdiction – exclusive jurisdiction of the Court of Syracuse
terms.clause6: 8.3: terms for disputes and refund requests
terms.contactUs: Contact us and we will be happy to help you

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy notice is served by Eugenia Travel Consultancy & Italy under the website https://www.eugeniastravelconsultancy.com. The purpose of this policy is to explain to you how we control, process, handle and protect your personal information through the business and while you browse or use this website.
privacy.defWe: "I", "our", "us", or "we" refer to the business, Eugenia Travel Consultancy.
privacy.defYou: "you", "the user" refer to the person(s) using this website.
privacy.defGDPR: GDPR means General Data Protection Act.
privacy.defPECR: PECR means Privacy & Electronic Communications Regulation.
privacy.defCookies: Cookies mean small files stored on a users computer or device.
privacy.gdprContent: Our privacy policy embodies the following key principles: (a) Lawfulness, fairness and transparency, (b) Purpose limitation, (c) Data minimisation, (d) Accuracy, (e) Storage limitation, (f) Integrity and confidence, (g) Accountability.
privacy.rightsIntro: Under the GDPR your rights are as follows:
privacy.right8: the right not to be subject to automated decision-making including profiling
privacy.cookiesContent: We use cookies on this website to provide you with a better user experience. We do this by placing a small text file on your device / computer hard drive to track how you use the website.
privacy.securityContent: We ensure the security of any personal information we hold by using secure data storage technologies and precise procedures in how we store, access and manage that information. Our methods meet the GDPR compliance requirement.
privacy.emailContent: Under the GDPR we use the consent lawful basis for anyone subscribing to our newsletter or marketing mailing list. We only collect certain data about you. Any email marketing messages we send are done so through an EMS, email marketing service provider.
privacy.contactUs: Contact us and we will be happy to help you
